message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with distributed storage networks, which are typically studied in the information theory (cs.IT) and distributed computing (cs.DC) communities. The use of helper selection schemes and code constructions also suggests the possibility of network coding (cs.NI) and systems and control (cs.SY) approaches. Finally, the practical benefits of the proposed code construction make it relevant to storage systems (cs.SI) research.
